projects.title: SproutEngine
projects.bodyText:
- Development of an OpenGL rendering engine
- Model loading, Shadowmapping, postprocessing, PBR rendering
- Adaptation of a terrain generation project for the engine
- Tools for raytraced rendering pipeline (CPU and GPU) 
- Basic Physics Engine
- Ongoing development

projects.title: Terrain generation and erosion
projects.bodyText:
- Development of a terrain generation tools used by the other students to complete their part of the assignment.
- Implementation of a water erosion algorithm on a single CPU core.

projects.title: Utimate Star Destroyer vs The World
projects.bodyText:
- Video game developed in a few hours.
- Shoot'em up inspired by the classics of the gender.
 - Shaders, upgradable weapon system, 3C, audio integration

projects.title: Voxel-based terrain generation
projects.bodyText:
- Voxelisation of an implicit-based terrain. 
 - Quadtree and adaptative voxelization, on a single CPU core.
 - fusion operators, procedural noise, notion of "potential" for the voxels.
- Project including a bit of work on a few geometry concepts: generation of triangle mesh, mesh I/O, mesh simplification, parametric curves.

projects.title: Ocean simulation
projects.bodyText:
- Wave generation using a sum of sine and FbM
- Realtime GPU simulation

projects.title: Soup
projects.bodyText:
- Creation of a game in a team of 5 students

projects.title: 3D scenes rendering
projects.bodyText:
- 3D scenes rendering using rasterization and raytracing during my ID3D master's degree, using the engine Gkit2light.
- GlTF file reading
- GPU instanciation
- Compute shaders
- Shadow mapping
- Monte Carlo path tracing

projects.title: Terrain generator
projects.bodyText:
- Generation of virtual worlds through procedural noise 
- Terrain data export: slope, wetness, laplacian...
- Tectonic erosion (https://inria.hal.science/hal-01262376/document)
- Procedural placement of villages through a maximisation of a score
- Generation of roads between the villages

projects.title: Coastal erosion simulation
projects.bodyText:

- Simulation of the growth of corals thanks to a DLA algorithm

projects.title: Gravitation simulation
projects.bodyText:
